casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Clyde Gary WHISENANT. No. 423P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 30, 2015. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

Staples Hughes, Durham.

Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Whisenant, Clyde Gary. David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of December 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of December 2015."
